P H Y S I C A L R E V I E W L E T T E R S week ending9 JULY 2004VOLUME 93, NUMBER 2Publisher’s Note: Fermi-Ulam Accelerator Model under Scaling Analysis
[Phys. Rev. Lett. 93, 014101 (2004)]
Edson D. Leonel, P.V. E. McClintock, and J. Kamphorst Leal da Silva
(Received 30 June 2004; published 8 July 2004)029901-1DOI: 10.1103/PhysRevLett.93.029901 PACS numbers: 05.45.Pq, 05.45.Ac, 47.52.+j, 99.10.FgThis Letter was published online on 28 June 2004 with an error in the definition of roughness [unnumbered equation
after Eq. (3)]. The first term under the radical should have the overbar extending over the superscript 2, indicating an
average of the squared velocity. This error has been corrected as of 30 June 2004. The text is correct in the printed
version of the journal.0031-9007=04=93(2)=029901(1)$22.50  2004 The American Physical Society 029901-1
